price: Gedenkt der Mensch denn nicht, daß Wir ihn zuvor erschaffen haben, da er (noch) nichts war?
arabic: أَوَلَا يَذۡكُرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ وَلَمۡ يَكُ شَيۡـٔٗا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: awalā yadhkuru al-insānu annā khalaqnāhu min qablu walam yaku shayan
